Name: clay roof tile production | clay roof tile | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2392:Manufacture of clay building materials
Description: Current production technology. This dataset corresponds to manufacturing of a clay roof tile factory, which incorporates machinery in their processes. The manufacturing process includes the reception of raw materials, dosing, mixing, forming by extrusion, drying, firing of wood, cooling and storage of tiles. The process begins by the mixing of raw materials. The mix is deposited in a mill, then moved to an extruder formed by a mixer and a matrix.
